english_example_sentence: If you had hoped for a successful outcome from this challenging project.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты надеялся на успешный результат от этого сложного проекта.
turkish_example_sentence: Sen, bu zorlu projeden başarılı bir sonuç ummuş olsaydın.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen, bu zorlu projeden başarılı bir sonuç ______.
